Name: ASN.1
Specification: ISO/IEC 8824; X.680 series of ITU-T Recommendations
Binary?: Yes(BER, DER, PER, OER, or custom via ECN)
Human-readable?: Yes(XER, JER, GSER, or custom via ECN)

Name: Bencode
Standardized?: De facto standard via BitTorrent Enhancement Proposal (BEP)

Name: Common Data Representation (CDR)
Standard APIs: ADA, C, C++, Java, Cobol, Lisp, Python, Ruby, Smalltalk

Name: FlatBuffers
Standard APIs: C++, Java, C#, Go, Python, Rust, JavaScript, PHP, C, Dart, Lua, TypeScript

Name: FHIR
Standard APIs: Hapi for FHIR[1] JSON, XML, Turtle

Name: JSON
Binary?: No, but see BSON, Smile, UBJSON
Supports references?e: Yes(JSON Pointer (RFC 6901);alternately:JSONPath, JPath, JSPON, json:select()), JSON-LD
Schema-IDL?: Partial(JSON Schema Proposal, ASN.1 with JER, Kwalify, Rx, Itemscript Schema), JSON-LD

Name: Pickle (Python)
Standardized?: De facto standard via Python Enhancement Proposals (PEPs)

Name: Protocol Buffers (protobuf)
Standard APIs: C++, C#, Java, Python, Javascript, Go

Name: Smile
Schema-IDL?: Partial(JSON Schema Proposal, other JSON schemas/IDLs)
Standard APIs: Partial(via JSON APIs implemented with Smile backend, on Jackson, Python)

Name: SOAP
Binary?: Partial(Efficient XML Interchange, Binary XML, Fast Infoset, MTOM, XSD base64 data)

Name: XML
Binary?: Partial(Efficient XML Interchange, Binary XML, Fast Infoset, XSD base64 data)

Name: YAML
Creator-maintainer: Clark Evans,Ingy döt Net,and Oren Ben-Kiki
Based on: C, Java, Perl, Python, Ruby, Email, HTML, MIME, URI, XML, SAX, SOAP, JSON[3]
